pageContext.claim: “Then you hear about Ukraine -- and you've been hearing about it. I heard Clinton was involved. I heard they got somebody who wrote the fake dossier. Was it out of Ukraine?”
pageContext.analysis: The dossier was written by former British spy Christopher Steele, who mostly interviewed sources connected to Russia for a U.S. research firm that had a contract from a Democratic law firm. Ukraine had little to do with it, though Trump's campaign manager, Paul Manafort, worked for the Russia-backed party.
